body_html:
Just for completeness, the updated Dockerfile for building TensorFlow 0.11 from source. This works for me (only for CPU compiled TF)

FROM ubuntu:16.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    build-essential \
    openjdk-8-jdk \
    pkg-config \
    zip \
    unzip \
    zlib1g-dev \
    bash-completion \
    git \
    wget \
    python && \
    apt-get clean

ENV BAZEL_VERSION 0.3.2
RUN wget "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/download/${BAZEL_VERSION}/bazel_${BAZEL_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.deb" && \
    dpkg -i "bazel_${BAZEL_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.deb" && \
    rm "bazel_${BAZEL_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.deb"

# Install TensorFlow

RUN apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends git python3-numpy swig python3-dev python3-wheel && apt-get clean
RUN ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/local/bin/python
RUN git clone --quiet --recurse-submodules https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git /tensorflow
RUN apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends python3-setuptools rsync && apt-get clean
WORKDIR /tensorflow

body:
Just for completeness, the updated `Dockerfile` for building TensorFlow 0.11 from source. This works for me (only for CPU compiled TF)

```
FROM ubuntu:16.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    build-essential \
    openjdk-8-jdk \
    pkg-config \
    zip \
    unzip \
    zlib1g-dev \
    bash-completion \
    git \
    wget \
    python && \
    apt-get clean

ENV BAZEL_VERSION 0.3.2
RUN wget "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/download/${BAZEL_VERSION}/bazel_${BAZEL_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.deb" && \
    dpkg -i "bazel_${BAZEL_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.deb" && \
    rm "bazel_${BAZEL_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.deb"

# Install TensorFlow

RUN apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends git python3-numpy swig python3-dev python3-wheel && apt-get clean
RUN ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/local/bin/python
RUN git clone --quiet --recurse-submodules https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git /tensorflow
RUN apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends python3-setuptools rsync && apt-get clean
WORKDIR /tensorflow
```
